HomePage.resume: Passionate and seasoned Software Engineer with a strong focus on frontend development. I work with JavaScript and TypeScript and specialize in all-things web. I thrive on collaborating with teams to deliver efficient, scalable, and visually appealing web applications.

resume.paragraf_1: Hello! Thanks for stopping by my personal website.I'm Jibran Khairy Akram, a Computer Engineering and Informatics student at Jakarta State Polytechnic, majoring in Multimedia and Network Engineering. I'm passionate about frontend development, with a strong foundation in JavaScript and TypeScript. My experience with various frontend libraries and frameworks has allowed me to navigate the ever-evolving world of web development with enthusiasm and dedication.
resume.paragraf_2: I specialize in building web applications that are intuitive, user-friendly, and deliver consistent, high-quality experiences. My core tech stack includes JavaScript and TypeScript, with hands-on experience in modern frameworks like React, Vite, and Next.js. As a fast learner and adaptive problem-solver, I thrive in dynamic, fast-paced environments where innovation is key. Iâ€™m a collaborative team player who values feedback and brings a humble, growth-oriented mindset to every project.
resume.paragraf_3: I firmly believe that strong communication leads to great results. I'm adaptable, think efficiently, and always strive to do my best. Throughout my journey, Iâ€™ve developed solid analytical and leadership skills, and I truly enjoy working collaboratively to achieve shared goals. I'm excited about future opportunities to grow and contribute through meaningful collaboration.

career_0.position: Project Leader & Full Stack Mobile Developer

responsibilities.responsibility_1: Led a cross-functional team in collaboration with Bithouse to solve real-world problems through IoT and mobile technology.
responsibilities.responsibility_2: Developed a native Android application using Kotlin for real-time interaction with IoT hardware.
responsibilities.responsibility_3: Built and maintained backend services using Express.js and integrated with Firebase Realtime Database.
responsibilities.responsibility_4: Deployed RESTful APIs on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for scalable and secure mobile access.
responsibilities.responsibility_5: Coordinated with team members responsible for hardware assembly, ESP32 programming, and sensor integration.

responsibilities.responsibility_1: Implemented Genesys Cloud features (call routing, user management, monitoring) to streamline operations.
responsibilities.responsibility_2: Configured BYOC for telephony integration, supporting flexible communication setups.
responsibilities.responsibility_3: Optimized workflows to improve call flow efficiency and simulate real-world contact center scenarios.
responsibilities.responsibility_4: Reduced routing response time by 60% (from 5s to 2s) through DID and queue configuration, ensuring high system availability.

responsibilities.responsibility_1: Managed employee data entry into the HRIS, including leave records, sick days, permissions, and contract updates, ensuring data accuracy and consistency.
responsibilities.responsibility_2: Assisted in the contract signing process and maintained internal employee correspondence to support HR operations.
responsibilities.responsibility_3: Collaborated with the Human Capital team to manage employee relations and administrative processes.
responsibilities.responsibility_4: Handled data entry of over 150 employee records into the HRIS, ensuring error-free and well-organized administrative processes.
